--- RACE LEAGUE / CLANWAR COMMANDS ---
[CAPTAIN COMMANDS] /rd - Readys up your team during warmup or between rounds. Once both captains ready up, the map starts. /tech - Calls a technical pause. Returns the match to warmup and resets the current round.
[ADMIN COMMANDS] F2 - Opens the Race League / Clanwar Admin Panel. /forcerd - or /forcestart - Forces both teams to be ready and immediately starts the next map. /playerpts [exact_nickname] [amount] - Sets the points of a specific player on the TAB scoreboard manually. /tech - Admins can also force a tech pause at any time.
[INFO] - In Clanwar mode, maps will not progress until both captains type /rd. - In Player League mode, there is an automatic 60-second warmup timer. - Team colors will automatically be applied to race vehicles and reset upon match completion.
